name: GENESIS
description:
This is a revised version of a previous artwork I'd created for the Ethereum token HOGE. 
It was my first time trading on Ethereum and I'd made a 3x profit overnight, realizing the opportunities of the world of crypto and effectively starting my crypto trading career.

I chose this piece out of others I'd created because of the simplicity of it, and the person portrayed in it is sports newscaster Adam Hoge, who initially gave HOGE a shoutout on his Twitter, thus inspiring me to create the (original) piece as a show of gratitude.

Today, I decide to mint this piece as my first ever NFT, taking the concept of the original artwork and refining it. 
HOGE was my first foray into crypto trading, and it will also be my first into the world of NFT's.
